label.text: Trajectory : Create a list of waypoints that Ned will go through, ending at the last pose/joint of the list.
Pick from pose = Move over the Pose ⮕ Move to Pose ⮕ Grasp with Tool ⮕ Move Up
Place from pose = Move over the Pose ⮕ Move to Pose ⮕ Release with Tool ⮕ Move Up

block.field: Move to an observation position then
Try to do a vision pick:
If an object has been taken, do:
Try to do a vision pick:
If an object has been taken, do:
Loop until there is an object detected:
